verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> and <WG2532> Silvanus, <WG4610> and <WG2532> Timothy, <WG5095> unto the <WG3588> church <WG1577> of the Thessalonians <WG2331> which is in <WG1722> God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> in the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547> Grace <WG5485> be unto you, <WG5213> and <WG2532> peace, <WG1515> from <WG575> God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Father, <WG3962> and <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
We give thanks <WG2168> to God <WG2316> always <WG3842> for <WG4012> you <WG5216> all, <WG3956> making <WG4160> mention <WG3417> of you <WG5216> in <WG1909> our <WG2257> prayers; <WG4335>

Remembering <WG3421> without ceasing <WG89> your <WG5216> work <WG2041> of faith, <WG4102> and <WG2532> labor <WG2873> of love, <WG26> and <WG2532> patience <WG5281> of hope <WG1680> in our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> in the sight <WG1715> of God <WG2316> and <WG2532> our <WG2257> Father; <WG3962>
Knowing, <WG1492> brethren <WG80> beloved, <WG25> your <WG5216> election <WG1589> of <WG5259> God. <WG2316>

For <WG3754> our <WG2257> gospel <WG2098> came <WG1096> not <WG3756> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> word <WG3056> only, <WG3440> but <WG235> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> power, <WG1411> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Ghost, <WG4151> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> much <WG4183> assurance; <WG4136> as <WG2531> ye know <WG1492> what manner of men <WG3634> we were <WG1096> among <WG1722> you <WG5213> for your sake. <WG1223> <WG5209>

And <WG2532> ye <WG5210> became <WG1096> followers <WG3402> of us, <WG2257> and <WG2532> of the <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> having received <WG1209> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> in <WG1722> much <WG4183> affliction, <WG2347> with <WG3326> joy <WG5479> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost: <WG4151>
So that <WG5620> ye <WG5209> were <WG1096> examples <WG5179> to all <WG3956> that believe <WG4100> in <WG1722> Macedonia <WG3109> and <WG2532> Achaia. <WG882>

For <WG1063> from <WG575> you <WG5216> sounded out <WG1837> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> in <WG1722> Macedonia <WG3109> and <WG2532> Achaia, <WG882> but <WG235> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> place <WG5117> your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> to <WG4314> God-ward <WG2316> is spread abroad; <WG1831> so that <WG5620> we <WG2248> need <WG2192> <WG5532> not <WG3361> to speak <WG2980> any thing. <WG5100>

For <WG1063> they <WG846> themselves show <WG518> of <WG4012> us <WG2257> what manner <WG3697> of entering in <WG1529> we had <WG2192> unto <WG4314> you, <WG5209> and <WG2532> how <WG4459> ye turned <WG1994> to <WG4314> God <WG2316> from <WG575> idols <WG1497> to serve <WG1398> the living <WG2198> and <WG2532> true <WG228> God; <WG2316>

And <WG2532> to wait for <WG362> his <WG846> Son <WG5207> from <WG1537> heaven, <WG3772> whom <WG3739> he raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead, <WG3498> even Jesus, <WG2424> which delivered <WG4506> us <WG2248> from <WG575> the <WG3588> wrath <WG3709> to come. <WG2064>
